style_guide.visual_style: Warm, friendly animated illustration style with soft pastel colors (peach, mint green, soft yellow). Clean line art with a modern, approachable Korean webtoon aesthetic. Bright and welcoming mood that feels casual and social.
style_guide.segment_story: A young woman approaches a young man at a casual cafe setting. She initiates friendly conversation, asking about his name, age, and hobbies, complimenting him naturally. The scene shows their growing rapport as they discover common interests. The environment includes cozy cafe details like coffee cups, plants, and warm lighting. By the end, she suggests becoming friends over coffee, and he responds positively to her friendly overtures.

images.prompt_used: A warm, inviting cafe interior scene with a young woman and young man sitting across from each other at a small round wooden table, soft pastel peach and mint green color palette, Korean webtoon illustration style with clean line art, the woman is leaning forward slightly with a friendly smile gesturing as if introducing herself, the man sits attentively with a gentle expression, two coffee cups on the table between them, potted plants on windowsill in background, warm golden hour lighting streaming through large windows, cozy cafe atmosphere with blurred shelves and hanging plants visible behind them, modern approachable aesthetic, soft shadows, welcoming mood, both characters are young adults in casual contemporary clothing, the woman wears a soft yellow cardigan, characters occupy the foreground prominently filling the frame, natural candid moment of friendly conversation beginning, intimate cafe booth setting, vertical composition, detailed facial features showing warmth and openness

Close-up side profile view of a young woman with long black hair in a ponytail, wearing a cream-colored cardigan, speaking with a gentle smile on her face. She is leaning slightly forward in an engaged, friendly manner. In the soft-focus background, a young man with short dark hair wearing a light blue button-up shirt is visible, listening attentively. Warm cafe interior with blurred bokeh lights, potted plants, and wooden furniture in the background. Soft pastel color palette with peach and mint green tones, warm golden lighting from cafe windows. Korean webtoon illustration style with clean line art, bright and welcoming atmosphere, intimate conversational moment.

Medium-close shot of a young Asian man with short dark brown hair and casual navy blue shirt, sitting at a cafe table, looking slightly to his left with a friendly, warm smile as he responds to a question. His body language is open and engaged, hands gesturing naturally near a coffee cup on the wooden table. In the foreground/side of frame, partially visible is the back of a young woman's head with long black hair in a ponytail and cream cardigan, indicating she's listening to him. Warm cafe environment with soft natural lighting from windows, blurred background showing cafe plants and warm wooden interior details. Warm, friendly animated illustration style with soft pastel colors, clean line art with modern Korean webtoon aesthetic.

Over-the-shoulder perspective shot from behind a young woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan, looking across a cafe table at a young Asian man with short dark brown hair wearing a navy blue casual shirt. The man sits facing the camera with a slightly shy, curious smile, one hand near his coffee cup. The cafe setting is visible with a large window behind him showing soft daylight, indoor plants on the windowsill, warm wooden furniture, and other cafe details like pastries on a nearby counter. Warm afternoon lighting filters through the window. The composition emphasizes the woman's perspective of observing the man, with her shoulder and side of her head visible in the foreground. Soft pastel color palette with peach, mint green, and soft yellow tones. Modern Korean webtoon illustration style with clean lines and warm, friendly atmosphere.

Wide side angle shot of a young Asian woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan sitting at a small round wooden cafe table across from a young Asian man with short dark brown hair wearing a casual navy blue shirt. The woman is leaning forward slightly with an animated, friendly expression, her hand raised in a natural conversational gesture as she asks a question. The man is turned toward her with an engaged, interested expression. Two coffee cups and a small potted succulent are on the table between them. The cafe setting shows warm afternoon sunlight streaming through large windows, other cafe tables and chairs visible in the soft-focus background, hanging plants, and wooden furniture. Warm, friendly animated illustration style with soft pastel colors (peach, mint green, soft yellow), clean line art with modern Korean webtoon aesthetic, bright and welcoming mood

Medium-close frontal shot of a young Asian woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan on the left side and a young Asian man with short dark brown hair wearing a navy blue shirt on the right side, both sitting at a cafe table, their faces visible in the same frame showing genuine warm smiles and friendly expressions as they share a moment of connection over their common interest, the woman's eyes bright and engaged, the man looking relaxed and happy, blurred cafe background with warm golden bokeh lights and soft green plant foliage creating depth, coffee cups visible on the wooden table surface between them, warm pastel color palette with peach and mint green tones, soft natural lighting creating a cozy intimate atmosphere, modern Korean webtoon illustration style with clean lines and gentle shading

Close-up diagonal angle shot in a cozy cafe setting showing a young Asian woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan leaning forward slightly across a small table, her hand gesturing toward or lightly touching the fabric of a young Asian man's navy blue casual shirt. The man with short dark brown hair sits with a surprised but pleased expression, looking down at his shirt then back at her with a shy smile. Visible cafe details include coffee cups on the wooden table between them, soft warm lighting, and blurred background with hanging plants and cafe shelves. Warm, friendly animated illustration style with soft pastel colors (peach, mint green, soft yellow), clean line art with modern Korean webtoon aesthetic, bright and welcoming casual atmosphere

High angle downward shot in a cozy cafe setting, looking down at a young Asian woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan, her face tilted slightly downward with a shy pleased smile and slight blush on her cheeks, her hands delicately holding a white ceramic coffee cup on a small round wooden table, the young Asian man with short dark brown hair in navy blue shirt visible in soft focus sitting across from her in the background, warm cafe lighting with potted plants and coffee shop details around them, gentle afternoon sunlight streaming through windows, warm pastel color palette with peach and mint green tones, Korean webtoon illustration style with clean lines and soft shading, intimate and tender mood

Low angle shot looking upward at a young Asian woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan, leaning forward slightly over a cafe table with a warm, inviting smile on her face, one hand extended in a welcoming gesture toward the camera. Her expression is friendly and hopeful. The background shows a cozy cafe interior with soft bokeh lights, hanging plants, and warm peachy-orange tones. A coffee cup sits on the wooden table in the lower foreground. The perspective makes her appear warm and approachable. Across from her, partially visible in the lower frame, is the back of a young Asian man's head and shoulder in a navy blue shirt. Warm, friendly animated illustration style with soft pastel colors, clean line art, modern Korean webtoon aesthetic, bright welcoming mood.

Wide establishing shot of a cozy cafe interior showing a young Asian woman with long black hair in a ponytail wearing a cream-colored cardigan and a young Asian man with short dark brown hair wearing a casual navy blue shirt, both standing or half-standing from their small round wooden table, smiling warmly at each other in a friendly manner. The scene captures both full figures or three-quarter body shots showing their complete interaction. The wooden table between them has two coffee cups, small potted succulent plants, and cafe items. Surrounding them is the warm cafe environment with hanging pendant lights, wall shelves with plants, other empty wooden tables and chairs, and large windows letting in natural light. Warm pastel color palette with peach, mint green, and soft yellow tones. Clean line art style with modern Korean webtoon aesthetic, bright and welcoming atmosphere showing the positive conclusion of their friendly coffee conversation.
